setEffects.4: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or a Bow.

flower.name: Troupe's Dawnlight
flower.desc: A small flower-shaped insignia. If you listen carefully, you can almost hear a flute playing and voices singing.

plume.name: Bard's Arrow Feather
plume.desc: An azure arrow fletching that has neither faded nor splintered with the passage of time. The sound of running water seems to linger around it.

sands.name: Concert's Final Hour
sands.desc: An hourglass used to keep time during a band performance. It once made a crisp sound, but their performance has since ended.

goblet.name: Wanderer's String-Kettle
goblet.desc: An ancient, strangely-shaped canteen. The interior is fitted with harp strings, which play a wondrous tune as the water flows out.

circlet.name: Conductor's Top Hat
circlet.desc: A top hat that has managed to retain its radiance despite braving the elements for time untold. An ancient tune still resonates within.
